metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The friendly name for the workspace that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The friendly name for the connected cluster.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance
The Azure region with which the workbook will be associated

parameters.name: Resource
parameters.label: Workspace
parameters.query:
InsightsMetrics 
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_info"
| distinct _ResourceId

parameters.name: Computer
parameters.label: Hostname
parameters.query:
KubeNodeInventory
| distinct Computer
| sort by Computer asc

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_actual_balloon_bytes"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend vmi = strcat(vmiNamespace, '/', vmiName)
| where vmiNode in ({Computer})
| extend actualBalloonBytes = Val
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_available_bytes"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend availableBytes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_domain_total_bytes"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend domainTotalBytes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_resident_bytes"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend memoryResidentBytes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_swap_in_traffic_bytes_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend swapInTrafficBytes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_swap_out_traffic_bytes_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend swapOutTrafficBytes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_unused_bytes"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend memoryUnusedBytes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_usable_bytes"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend memoryUsableBytes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode
| top-nested of vmiName by max(1), top-nested of vmiNamespace by max(1), top-nested of vmiNode by max(1), top-nested 1 of TimeGenerated by max(TimeGenerated), top-nested of actualBalloonBytes by max(1), top-nested of availableBytes by max(1), top-nested of domainTotalBytes by max(1), top-nested of memoryResidentBytes by max(1), top-nested of swapInTrafficBytes by max(1), top-nested of swapOutTrafficBytes by max(1), top-nested of memoryUnusedBytes by max(1), top-nested of memoryUsableBytes by max(1)
| join kind=inner(
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_pgmajfault"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend vmi = strcat(vmiNamespace, '/', vmiName)
| extend pgmajfault = Val
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_pgminfault"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend pgminfault = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode
| project TimeGenerated, Tags, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, pgmajfault, pgminfault
| order by Tags, TimeGenerated asc
| extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(Tags) != Tags, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| extend PrevPgmajfault = prev(pgmajfault)
| extend PrevPgminfault = prev(pgminfault)
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend DeltaPgmajfault = iif(PrevPgmajfault > pgmajfault, pgmajfault, (pgmajfault - PrevPgmajfault)) 
| extend DeltaPgminfault = iif(PrevPgminfault > pgminfault, pgminfault, (pgminfault - PrevPgminfault)) 
| extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| summarize pgmajfault = sum(DeltaPgmajfault), pgminfault = sum(DeltaPgminfault), TimeSeconds = sum(DeltaTime) by vmiNode, vmiName, vmiNamespace
) on vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode
| project vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, actualBalloonBytes, availableBytes, domainTotalBytes, memoryResidentBytes, swapInTrafficBytes, swapOutTrafficBytes, memoryUnusedBytes, memoryUsableBytes, pgmajfault, pgminfault
content.title: Virtual Machine Instances

labelSettings.label: Available Memory
labelSettings.comment: Amount of usable memory as seen by the domain

labelSettings.label: Domain Memory
labelSettings.comment: The amount of memory in bytes allocated to the domain

labelSettings.label: Resident Memory
labelSettings.comment: Resident set size of the process running the domain

labelSettings.label: Swap In Traffic
labelSettings.comment: Swap in memory traffic in bytes

labelSettings.label: Swap Out Traffic
labelSettings.comment: Swap out memory traffic in bytes

labelSettings.label: Unused Memory
labelSettings.comment: Amount of unused memory as seen by the domain

labelSettings.label: Usable Memory
labelSettings.comment: The amount of memory which can be reclaimed by balloon without causing host swapping in bytes

labelSettings.label: Disk I/O Page Faults
labelSettings.comment: The number of page faults when disk IO was required

labelSettings.label: Other Page Faults
labelSettings.comment: The number of other page faults, when disk IO was not required

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_storage_iops_write_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend drive = tostring(json.drive)
| where vmiNode in ({Computer})
| extend iopsWriteTotal = Val
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_storage_iops_read_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend drive = tostring(json.drive)
| extend iopsReadTotal = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, drive
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_storage_read_traffic_bytes_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend drive = tostring(json.drive)
| extend readTraffic = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, drive
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_storage_write_traffic_bytes_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend drive = tostring(json.drive)
| extend writeTraffic = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, drive
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_storage_read_times_ms_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend drive = tostring(json.drive)
| extend readTimes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, drive
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_storage_write_times_ms_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend drive = tostring(json.drive)
| extend writeTimes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, drive
| project TimeGenerated, Tags, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, drive, iopsWriteTotal, iopsReadTotal, readTraffic, writeTraffic, readTimes, writeTimes
| order by Tags, TimeGenerated asc
| extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(Tags) != Tags, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| extend PrevIopsWriteTotal = prev(iopsWriteTotal)
| extend PrevIopsReadTotal = prev(iopsReadTotal)
| extend PrevReadTraffic = prev(readTraffic)
| extend PrevWriteTraffic = prev(writeTraffic)
| extend PrevReadTimes = prev(readTimes)
| extend PrevWriteTimes = prev(writeTimes)
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend DeltaIopsWriteTotal = iif(PrevIopsWriteTotal > iopsWriteTotal, iopsWriteTotal, (iopsWriteTotal - PrevIopsWriteTotal)) 
| extend DeltaIopsReadTotal = iif(PrevIopsReadTotal > iopsReadTotal, iopsReadTotal, (iopsReadTotal - PrevIopsReadTotal)) 
| extend DeltaReadTraffic = iif(PrevReadTraffic > readTraffic, readTraffic, (readTraffic - PrevReadTraffic)) 
| extend DeltaWriteTraffic = iif(PrevWriteTraffic > writeTraffic, writeTraffic, (writeTraffic - PrevWriteTraffic)) 
| extend DeltaReadTimes = iif(PrevReadTimes > readTimes, readTimes, (readTimes - PrevReadTimes)) 
| extend DeltaWriteTimes = iif(PrevWriteTimes > writeTimes, writeTimes, (writeTimes - PrevWriteTimes)) 
| extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| summarize IopsWritesTotal = sum(DeltaIopsWriteTotal), IopsReadsTotal = sum(DeltaIopsReadTotal), ReadTrafficBytes = sum(DeltaReadTraffic), WriteTrafficBytes = sum(DeltaWriteTraffic), ReadTimesMillis = sum(DeltaReadTimes), WriteTimesMillis = sum(DeltaWriteTimes), TimeSeconds = sum(DeltaTime) by vmiNode, vmiName, vmiNamespace, drive
content.title: Storage Drives

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_vcpu_seconds"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend vmi = strcat(vmiNamespace, '/', vmiName)
| where vmiNode in ({Computer})
| extend row = parse_json('{vmi}')
| where tostring(row) == 'all' or (vmiName == row.vmiName and vmiNamespace == row.vmiNamespace)
| sort by Tags, TimeGenerated asc
| extend cpu = tostring(json.id)
| extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(Tags) != Tags, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| extend PrevVal = prev(Val)
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend totalvCPUTimeinSeconds = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, Val - PrevVal)
| extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| summarize cpuUsage = sum(totalvCPUTimeinSeconds) / sum(DeltaTime) by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), vmiName, vmiNamespace, cpu
content.title: Average CPU Usage

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_memory_resident_bytes"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend vmi = strcat(vmiNamespace, '/', vmiName)
| where vmiNode in ({Computer})
| extend row = parse_json('{vmi}')
| where tostring(row) == 'all' or (vmiName == row.vmiName and vmiNamespace == row.vmiNamespace)
content.title: Memory Usage (RSS)

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name in ("kubevirt_vmi_storage_iops_read_total","kubevirt_vmi_storage_iops_write_total")
| sort by Tags, Name, TimeGenerated asc 
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend vmi = strcat(vmiNamespace, '/', vmiName)
| where vmiNode in ({Computer})
| extend drive = tostring(json.drive)
| extend row = parse_json('{drive}')
| where tostring(row) == 'all' or (vmiName == row.vmiName and vmiNamespace == row.vmiNamespace and drive == row.drive)
| extend type = strcat(vmiName, " - ", drive, " - ", iff(Name == 'kubevirt_vmi_storage_iops_read_total', 'read', 'write'))
| extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(Tags) != Tags or prev(Name) != Name, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| extend PrevVal = prev(Val)
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend DeltaVal = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, (Val - PrevVal)) 
| extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend IOPS = DeltaVal / DeltaTime
content.title: IOPS

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name in ("kubevirt_vmi_storage_read_traffic_bytes_total", "kubevirt_vmi_storage_write_traffic_bytes_total")
| sort by Tags, Name, TimeGenerated asc 
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend vmi = strcat(vmiNamespace, '/', vmiName)
| where vmiNode in ({Computer})
| extend drive = tostring(json.drive)
| extend row = parse_json('{drive}')
| where tostring(row) == 'all' or (vmiName == row.vmiName and vmiNamespace == row.vmiNamespace and drive == row.drive)
| extend type = strcat(vmiName, " - ", drive, " - ", iff(Name == 'kubevirt_vmi_storage_read_traffic_bytes_total', 'read', 'write'))
| extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(Tags) != Tags or prev(Name) != Name, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| extend PrevVal = prev(Val)
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend DeltaVal = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, (Val - PrevVal)) 
| extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend iotraffic = DeltaVal / DeltaTime
content.title: IO Traffic

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name in ("kubevirt_vmi_storage_read_times_ms_total", "kubevirt_vmi_storage_write_times_ms_total")
| sort by Tags, Name, TimeGenerated asc 
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend vmi = strcat(vmiNamespace, '/', vmiName)
| where vmiNode in ({Computer})
| extend drive = tostring(json.drive)
| extend row = parse_json('{drive}')
| where tostring(row) == 'all' or (vmiName == row.vmiName and vmiNamespace == row.vmiNamespace and drive == row.drive)
| extend dtype = strcat(vmiName, " - ", drive, " - ", iff(Name == 'kubevirt_vmi_storage_read_times_ms_total', 'read', 'write'))
| extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(Tags) != Tags or prev(Name) != Name, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| extend PrevVal = prev(Val)
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend DeltaVal = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, (Val - PrevVal)) 
| extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Minute', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend iotime = DeltaVal / DeltaTime
content.title: IO Time

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_network_receive_bytes_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend interface = tostring(json.interface)
| where vmiNode in ({Computer})
| extend receiveBytes = Val
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_network_receive_errors_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend interface = tostring(json.interface)
| extend receiveErrors = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, interface
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_network_receive_packets_dropped_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend interface = tostring(json.interface)
| extend receivePacketsDropped = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, interface
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_network_receive_packets_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend interface = tostring(json.interface)
| extend receivePacketsTotal = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, interface
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_network_transmit_bytes_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend interface = tostring(json.interface)
| extend transmitBytes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, interface
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_network_transmit_errors_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend interface = tostring(json.interface)
| extend transmitErrors = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, interface
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend interface = tostring(json.interface)
| extend transmitPacketsDropped = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, interface
| join kind=inner (InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name == "kubevirt_vmi_network_transmit_packets_total"
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend interface = tostring(json.interface)
| extend transmitPacketsTotal = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, interface
| project TimeGenerated, Tags, vmiName, vmiNamespace, vmiNode, interface, receiveBytes, receiveErrors, receivePacketsDropped, receivePacketsTotal, transmitBytes, transmitErrors, transmitPacketsDropped, transmitPacketsTotal
| order by Tags, TimeGenerated asc
| extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(Tags) != Tags, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| extend PrevReceiveBytes = prev(receiveBytes)
| extend PrevReceiveErrors = prev(receiveErrors)
| extend PrevReceivePacketsDropped = prev(receivePacketsDropped)
| extend PrevReceivePacketsTotal = prev(receivePacketsTotal)
| extend PrevTransmitBytes = prev(transmitBytes)
| extend PrevTransmitErrors = prev(transmitErrors)
| extend PrevTransmitPacketsDropped = prev(transmitPacketsDropped)
| extend PrevTransmitPacketsTotal = prev(transmitPacketsTotal)
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend DeltaReceiveBytes = iif(PrevReceiveBytes > receiveBytes, receiveBytes, (receiveBytes - PrevReceiveBytes)) 
| extend DeltaReceiveErrors = iif(PrevReceiveErrors > receiveErrors, receiveErrors, (receiveErrors - PrevReceiveErrors)) 
| extend DeltaReceivePacketsDropped = iif(PrevReceivePacketsDropped > receivePacketsDropped, receivePacketsDropped, (receivePacketsDropped - PrevReceivePacketsDropped)) 
| extend DeltaReceivePacketsTotal = iif(PrevReceivePacketsTotal > receivePacketsTotal, receivePacketsTotal, (receivePacketsTotal - PrevReceivePacketsTotal)) 
| extend DeltaTransmitBytes = iif(PrevTransmitBytes > transmitBytes, transmitBytes, (transmitBytes - PrevTransmitBytes)) 
| extend DeltaTransmitErrors = iif(PrevTransmitErrors > transmitErrors, transmitErrors, (transmitErrors - PrevTransmitErrors)) 
| extend DeltaTransmitPacketsDropped = iif(PrevTransmitPacketsDropped > transmitPacketsDropped, transmitPacketsDropped, (transmitPacketsDropped - PrevTransmitPacketsDropped)) 
| extend DeltaTransmitPacketsTotal = iif(PrevTransmitPacketsTotal > transmitPacketsTotal, transmitPacketsTotal, (transmitPacketsTotal - PrevTransmitPacketsTotal)) 
| extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| summarize ReceiveBytes = sum(DeltaReceiveBytes), ReceiveErrors = sum(DeltaReceiveErrors), ReceivePacketsDropped = sum(DeltaReceivePacketsDropped), ReceivePacketsTotal = sum(DeltaReceivePacketsTotal), TransmitBytes = sum(DeltaTransmitBytes), TransmitErrors = sum(DeltaTransmitErrors), TransmitPacketsDropped = sum(DeltaTransmitPacketsDropped), TransmitPacketsTotal = sum(DeltaTransmitPacketsTotal) by vmiNode, vmiName, vmiNamespace, interface
content.title: Network Interfaces

labelSettings.label: Receive Packets Dropped
labelSettings.comment: The number of rx packets dropped on vNIC interfaces

labelSettings.label: Transmit Packets Dropped
labelSettings.comment: The number of tx packets dropped on vNIC interfaces

content.query:
InsightsMetrics
| where Namespace == "prometheus" and Name in ("kubevirt_vmi_network_receive_bytes_total", "kubevirt_vmi_network_transmit_bytes_total")
| sort by Name, Tags, TimeGenerated asc 
| extend json = parse_json(Tags)
| extend vmiName = tostring(json.name)
| extend vmiNamespace = tostring(json.namespace)
| extend vmiNode = tostring(json.node)
| extend vmi = strcat(vmiNamespace, '/', vmiName)
| where vmiNode in ({Computer})
| extend interface = tostring(json.interface)
| extend row = parse_json('{interface}')
| where tostring(row) == 'all' or (vmiName == row.vmiName and vmiNamespace == row.vmiNamespace and interface == row.interface)
| extend type = strcat(vmiName, " - ", interface, " - ", iff(Name == 'kubevirt_vmi_network_receive_bytes_total', 'rx', 'tx'))
| extend PrevTimeGenerated = iif(prev(Tags) != Tags or prev(Name) != Name, datetime(null), prev(TimeGenerated))
| extend PrevVal = prev(Val)
| where isnotnull(PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend DeltaVal = iif(PrevVal > Val, Val, (Val - PrevVal)) 
| extend DeltaTime = datetime_diff('Second', TimeGenerated, PrevTimeGenerated)
| extend nettraffic = DeltaVal / DeltaTime
content.title: Network Traffic

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Name, Namespace
| summarize dcount(Name) by Computer
content.title: Count of Pod running in each Node

content.query:
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| distinct Computer, Name, Namespace, ContainerID
| summarize dcount(ContainerID) by Computer

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}", "-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
//| where TimeGenerated >= ago(startDateTime)
| where Namespace in('default', 'kube-system', 'nc-system') // and ControllerKind == 'ReplicaSet' // the system namespace filter goes here
| distinct
    ClusterName,
    Computer,
    PodUid,
    TimeGenerated,
    PodStatus,
    ServiceName,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    ContainerStatus,
    Name,
    ControllerKind
| summarize
    arg_max(TimeGenerated, *),
    TotalPODCount = count(),
    podCount = sumif(1, PodStatus == 'Running' or PodStatus != 'Running'),
    containerNotrunning = sumif(1, ContainerStatus != 'running')
    by
    ClusterName,
    TimeGenerated,
    ServiceName,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    Name,
    ControllerKind
| project
    ClusterName,
    ServiceName,
    podCount,
    containerNotrunning,
    containerNotrunningPercent = (containerNotrunning * 100 / podCount),
    TimeGenerated,
    PodStatus,
    PodLabel,
    Namespace,
    Environment = tostring(split(ClusterName, '-')[3]),
    Location = tostring(split(ClusterName, '-')[4]),
    ContainerStatus,
    ControllerKind,
    Name,
    Computer
//Uncomment the below line to set for automated alert
| where PodStatus == "Running" //and containerNotrunningPercent > _minalertThreshold and containerNotrunningPercent < _maxalertThreshold
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *), c_entry=count() by PodLabel, ServiceName, ClusterName, ControllerKind, Name, Computer
//Below lines are to parse the labels to identify the impacted service/component name
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'k8s-app', @'k8sapp', PodLabel)
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'app.kubernetes.io/component', @'appkubernetesiocomponent', parseLabel)
| extend parseLabel = replace(@'app.kubernetes.io/instance', @'appkubernetesioinstance', parseLabel)
| extend tags = todynamic(parseLabel)
| extend tag01 = todynamic(tags[0].app)
| extend tag02 = todynamic(tags[0].k8sapp)
| extend tag03 = todynamic(tags[0].appkubernetesiocomponent)
| extend tag04 = todynamic(tags[0].aadpodidbinding)
| extend tag05 = todynamic(tags[0].appkubernetesioinstance)
| extend tag06 = todynamic(tags[0].component)
| extend ContainerRunning = 100 - containerNotrunningPercent
| project ClusterName, TimeGenerated, ControllerKind, Name, Computer,
    ServiceName = strcat(ServiceName, tag01, tag02, tag03, tag04, tag05, tag06),
    ContainerUnavailable = strcat("Unavailable Percentage: ", containerNotrunningPercent),
    ContainerRunning,
    containerNotrunningPercent,
    PodStatus = PodStatus, 
    ContainerStatus = ContainerStatus
content.title: Pod/Container Availability

KubePodInventory

| extend  PodName = Name
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName
//| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, PodName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, ControllerKind, ControllerName

let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, _ResourceId

content.query:
let row = dynamic({row});
KubePodInventory
| where Name has strcat("{Application}","-")
| where Computer in ({Computer})
| where '{row}' == '{}' or (Name == row.PodName)
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, Namespace, Name, PodUid, PodCreationTimeStamp, PodRestartCount, PodStartTime, PodStatus, PodIp, ServiceName, ControllerKind, ControllerName, ContainerID, ContainerLastStatus, ContainerName, ContainerRestartCount, ContainerStartTime, ContainerStatus, ContainerStatusReason, _ResourceId
| join ContainerLog on Computer, ContainerID, _ResourceId

| project-rename TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated1
